title: Stag and Dagger Tip: Egyptian Hip Hop
body:
![Egyptian Hip Hop](http://someonesinthewolf.files.wordpress.com/2010/01/34977_nme_favs_egyptian_hip_hop.jpg "Egyptian Hip Hop")Having already done a [short interview](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/?p=360) for _**CitR**_ earlier last month, Manchester founded band **Egyptian Hip Hop** are set to be another of the large crowd pullers at the Glasgow leg of **Stag and Dagger** this weekend. Coming off the back of releasing their debut single; _Wild Human Child_, **Hewett** and co. are sure to be in their accustomed energetic mood. With the upcoming release of their debut album as well as festival slots at **Dot to Dot**, **Glastonbury** and **Bestival** in the near future, **Stag and Dagger** may be your last chance to catch Egyptian Hip Hop in an intimate venue.

[Check Out Egyptian Hip Hop’s Myspace](http://www.myspace.com/egyptianhiphop)

[Buy Tickets For Stag And Dagger](http://www.staganddagger.com/)
